task_description: Task to schedule a doctor visit

nice_to_have: Need a specific doctor I've seen before
Want to ensure the doctor speaks my preferred language
Request an appointment that accommodates my work schedule
deal_breakers: Doctor doesn't accept my insurance plan
The location of the clinic is too far

technical: Something that has a modern interface but I'm not sure what that means
I think it needs to have good performance like fast loading times, whatever that means
Maybe some integration with my phone, but I don't really know how that works
non_technical: I guess I want it to be user-friendly, but what does that really mean?
It should probably have some sort of customer service, but I'm not sure what level is necessary
I heard having a good reputation is important, but I don't know how to check that

must_meet: The appointment should be on a day when I think I'm free, but I can't be sure
It must have something to do with my insurance, although I'm not clear on the details
I think I need to see a specific kind of doctor, but I'm not fully confident about the specialty
should_meet: It would be great if the clinic is nearby, but I'm not really sure how far is too far
I would prefer the doctor speaks my language, but I might be okay if they don't
If it could fit my vague work schedule, that would be nice but I'm not certain when I'm free
nice_to_meet: I think having an online booking option would be helpful, but I donâ€™t know if that's necessary
It might be nice if I could get a reminder, but I'm not sure how that would work
If the system was somewhat intuitive, that would be cool, but I can't define what that means
